title: Fully exploited imidazolium bromide for simultaneous resolution of cathode and anode challenges in zinc–bromine batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02096K, Paper
Linyu Hu, Chunlong Dai, Yudong Zhu, Xu Hou, Zhimeng Liu, Xin Geng, Hailong Wang, Jing Chen, Nuo Sun, Qinlang Rong, Yuhao Zhu, Xin He, Yuanjing Lin
An imidazolium bromide is developed to simultaneously tackle the challenges of the bromine cathode and the Zn anode in Zn–Br2 batteries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
